main

Interface Track

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrackLayerCompound, TrackLayerSimple

    public interface Track
extends java.io.Serializable
    Any audio track
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTo(MetaSamples current)
      Take the existing samples and do whatever with them
      Can overlay audio data, apply effects, etc.
      double[] getTimeBounds()
      Get the track bounds as double array
      First element is minimum/left/start
      Second element is maximum/right/end
      All are in seconds relative to very beginning
      MetaComponent<? extends javax.swing.JComponent> getUI()
      Request UI with metadata
      If the returned value is an instance of JInternalFrame it will be displayed separately and tracked by the window manager
      MetaComponent<? extends javax.swing.JComponent> getViewComponent()
      Get component to display inline in the track viewer which would be part of a TrackLayerCompound's UI
      Composition parentComposition()
      Convenience method Get parent composition, do whatever it takes to find it

    • Method Detail

      • applyTo

        void applyTo(MetaSamples current)
        Take the existing samples and do whatever with them
        Can overlay audio data, apply effects, etc.
        Buffer size is sample length
        Parameters:
        current - the samples so far

      • getTimeBounds

        double[] getTimeBounds()
        Get the track bounds as double array
        First element is minimum/left/start
        Second element is maximum/right/end
        All are in seconds relative to very beginning
        Returns:
        double array of size 2 containing start time and end time

      • parentComposition

        Composition parentComposition()
        Convenience method Get parent composition, do whatever it takes to find it
        Returns:
        parent Composition object

      • getUI

        MetaComponent<? extends javax.swing.JComponent> getUI()
        Request UI with metadata
        If the returned value is an instance of JInternalFrame it will be displayed separately and tracked by the window manager
        Returns:
        component with metadata

      • getViewComponent

        MetaComponent<? extends javax.swing.JComponent> getViewComponent()
        Get component to display inline in the track viewer which would be part of a TrackLayerCompound's UI
        Returns:
        component with metadata
        See Also:
        TrackLayerCompound
